welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bonneville, a charming city known for its breathtaking views, picturesque streets, and rich culture. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annemasse Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal where all domestic and international flights are processed.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annecy-Meythe Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
